thread.title: Trump picks Neil Gorsuch as Supreme Court nominee
thread.title_full: Trump picks Neil Gorsuch as Supreme Court nominee

author: The Associated Press
title: Trump picks Neil Gorsuch as Supreme Court nominee
text:
Trump picks Neil Gorsuch as Supreme Court nominee If approved, the 49-year-old federal appeals court judge will reinstate conservative majority The Associated Press Posted: Jan 31, 2017 8:11 PM ET Last Updated: Jan 31, 2017 8:14 PM ET President Donald Trump speaks in the East Room of the White House in Washington, Tuesday to announce judge Neil Gorsuch as his nominee for the Supreme Court. Gorsuch stands with his wife Louise. (Carolyn Kaster/Associated Press) 
U.S. President Donald Trump has announced 49-year-old appeals court judge Neil Gorsuch as his selection to fill a Supreme Court seat that has been vacant for almost a year â€” a move that would reinstate the court's conservative majority. 
More to come.
